name: chat-app
description: ### [MERN Stack Project: Realtime Chat App Tutorial - React.js & Socket.io](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ntKkVrQqBYY)  [![MERN Stack Project: Realtime Chat App Tutorial - React.js & Socket.io ](https://img.youtube.com/vi/ntKkVrQqBYY/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ntKkVrQqBYY)

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: npm start --prefix backend && npm start --prefix frontend
